name: @leclabs/agent-toolkit
description: The essential Claude Code plugin marketplace for reliable Agent-led workflow orchestration

scripts.release: npm whoami --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ || (echo '\nAuth failed. Run: npm config set //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken=YOUR_TOKEN' && exit 1) && npm publish --access public && cd packages/agent-flow-navigator-mcp && npm publish --access public
scripts.dev:setup: npm run dev:setup:mcp && npm run dev:setup:plugin
scripts.dev:setup:plugin: (claude plugin uninstall flow@agent-toolkit || true) && (claude plugin marketplace remove agent-toolkit || true) && claude plugin marketplace add $(pwd) && claude plugin install flow@agent-toolkit

author: Lance Caraccioli
